mapper.insert: insert into calendar(cal_num, cal_title, member_num, cal_contents, starts, ends, allday, islive) values( Reply_num.nextval, #{cal_title}, #{member_num}, #{cal_contents}, default, default, 1, 1 )
mapper.update: update reply set reply_contents= #{reply_contents} where reply_num= #{reply_num}
mapper.select: update calendar set islive = 0 where cal_num = #{cal_num}
